doc.title: Heroes Among Us, Miracles Around Us
doc.plot: The threads of history are woven together with stories that inspire and amaze mankind. They are the stories of heroes and miracles and for centuries they have given man something to hope and strive for. But today, the headlines are filled with nothing but bad news. Is the 21st century landscape as bleak as it seems? Or are there extraordinary stories still waiting to be found in the most unlikely of places? Heroes Among Us, Miracles Around Us will take you on an inspiring journey as we examine true stories of survival that defy explanation and heroic deeds that have moved the world to tears?all of which occurred on one of the darkest days in history?September 11, 2001.
